user_query: I'm hosting a family gathering and want to create a joyful atmosphere. Can you suggest some hilarious insults to use in a playful manner? Moreover, I need some jokes suitable for all ages to entertain the kids. Also, find a nearby hotel for the out-of-town family members.

TaskList.description: Gather a list of hilarious playful insults suitable for a family gathering.
Compile a collection of age-appropriate jokes to entertain kids at the gathering.
Search for nearby hotels that can accommodate out-of-town family members.
